Description: Mould-made pottery lamp with a double-convex body, a long rounded nozzle with a round tip, and a raised oval base, flat below and damaged. The filling-hole is surrounded by a double moulding. The shoulder is decorated with radiating grooves. On each side is a solid lug. The upper surface is covered with an orange-brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q588)
